data.name: Draco Space X
data.detailed_description:
Arcade 2D shooting game in space, in which you face enemies, full of lights and colors for your sight, you can equip new ships and conquer the trials!

You will be able to face enemies in order to pass the trials, you will get new ships on the way, each one with different shooting modes, and with its own characteristics. Try to dodge the bullets and the enemies in front of you to beat each level!


  • Lights and colors in each stage, different in each phase.

  • More than 20 different replayable levels.

  • Different music for each type of challenge

  • Different ships to play, each one with different characteristics.

  • The experience of defeating many enemies!
data.about_the_game:
Arcade 2D shooting game in space, in which you face enemies, full of lights and colors for your sight, you can equip new ships and conquer the trials!

You will be able to face enemies in order to pass the trials, you will get new ships on the way, each one with different shooting modes, and with its own characteristics. Try to dodge the bullets and the enemies in front of you to beat each level!

  • Different music for each type of challenge

  • Different ships to play, each one with different characteristics.

  • The experience of defeating many enemies!
data.short_description: 2D Arcade space action game, in which you will face different challenges. You must manage to kill your enemies or survive from them! Venture to discover a new universe full of lights!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel I3 or Better /Amd Serie FX Or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or dedicated graphics (Intel or AMD).
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I5 or Better /Amd Serie Ryzen Or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8000 or Better - Radeon HD 5000 Or Better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Sistema operativo de 64 Bits
